form.noAccount: Do not have an account yet?

contact.subtitle: Ready to make your event extraordinary? Get in touch with us today. Our team is here to help you find the perfect models and hostesses.
contact.FAQSub: Find answers to common questions about our services
contact.Q1: How far in advance should I book models or hostesses?
contact.Q2: Do you provide services outside of major cities?
contact.Q3: What is included in your service packages?
contact.Ans1: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance for standard events, and 6-8 weeks for large-scale events or during peak seasons.
contact.Ans2: Yes, we provide services nationwide and internationally. Additional travel fees may apply for locations outside our primary service areas.
contact.Ans3: Our packages include professional staff, basic styling, coordination support, and insurance coverage. Additional services can be customized based on your needs.
contact.Ans4: While we always try to accommodate urgent requests, availability may be limited. We recommend contacting us as soon as possible for the best selection.

form.name: Full name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your event and requirements....

About.subtitle1: At Models & Hostesses by General Consulting Group, we are more than just a modeling and hostess agency. We embody the elegance, authenticity, and professionalism at the heart of the fashion, events, and hospitality industries.
About.subtitle2: Founded under the General Consulting Group banner, our modeling and hostess services branch is a direct response to the demanding and refined needs of modern businesses seeking a unique and personalized touch for their events, brand campaigns, or promotional activities.
About.visionDesc: Our vision is to make Models & Hostesses by General Consulting Group a pillar of the modeling and luxury hospitality industry in Africa, offering distinctive services and a model of excellence to our clients. By leveraging local potential and cultural diversity, we aim to promote the art of modeling and hospitality with deep respect for the talents that make up our team, while meeting the highest international standards.
About.valueDesc: We believe in the power of authenticity, diversity, and excellence. These founding values guide our daily work and are part of our commitment to our clients and our talents. We are committed to the growth of our models and hostesses by offering them opportunities for professional development and creating a respectful and stimulating environment.
About.commitDesc: We are committed to building a future where modeling and hospitality are valued professions, promoted within an ethical framework of mutual respect. As pioneers in this sector in Cameroon and Rwanda, we aim to strengthen our position while continuing to train and inspire the next generation of talent in the industry.

WhyChooseUs.description: By collaborating with Models & Hostesses by General Consulting Group, you benefit from:
WhyChooseUs.description1: Only the best professionals with extensive experience in the industry.
WhyChooseUs.Subtitle2: A team attentive to your needs
WhyChooseUs.description2: Round-the-clock customer service to meet your need anytime.
WhyChooseUs.subtitle3: Industry expertise that guarantees the success of your projects
WhyChooseUs.description3: Access to a worldwide network of professional models and hostesses.
WhyChooseUs.lastSentence: Our commitment to quality and our network of partners make us the preferred choice for companies and brands looking to stand out.

Service.title: Our Services:
Service.description: We offer a range of top-notch services, tailored to the specific needs of each client.
Service.description1: We provide carefully selected models to meet the needs of advertising campaigns, fashion shows, editorial shoots, and much more. Our models combine charisma, stage presence, and professionalism, providing an impeccable visual representation for each brand.
Service.description2: Our hostesses and models are trained to provide exceptional hospitality, combining courtesy, elegance, and professionalism. Whether for trade shows, conferences, private or corporate events, our reception staff reflects the excellence we stand for.
Service.description3: For promotional campaigns that require a direct and impactful approach, we provide dynamic and experienced teams capable of representing your brand in on-the-ground actions with a commitment that makes a lasting impression.
Service.description4: With solid expertise in event management, we handle the planning and organization of your events, guaranteeing flawless execution. Our team provides a turnkey service, from design to implementation, for a memorable event.

documentVerification.title: Document Verification
documentVerification.uploadInfo: Upload a government-issued ID to verify your identity.
documentVerification.acceptedDocuments: We accept passports, driver's licenses, and national ID cards.
importantPoints: Your ID will be scanned for personal data extraction.
Please provide the original ID; copies or screenshots are not accepted.
Ensure all information is visible; damaged or expired IDs are not accepted.

livenessVerification.title: Liveness Verification
livenessVerification.description: This step helps us confirm that you're a real person. Follow the simple instructions to complete the verification.
livenessVerification.cameraRequired: Camera and connection are required for liveness verification.
livenessVerification.startCamera: Click the button below to start camera verification
livenessVerification.privacyNote: Privacy Note: Your webcam data is processed securely and locally. No video is stored, only verification results.
